name: Europro
goal:
Europro aims at a more facilitated trade. Reducing system and transaction costs.
National members provide training and consultation to achieve this goal.
Europro supports the WTO and WCO in their work for the Trade Facilitation Agreement.
interests: Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, External Relations, Internal Market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Implementation of European Customs Legislation
Trade facilitation
T-TIP and other trade agreements
